abstract: Automobile designer Jason Castriota, who has helped create several famous cars, will lead design team at Saab; hopes to revive struggling company.
snippet: With a pedigree chock-full of legendary cars, the designer Jason Castriota is hoping to begin a new era at the struggling carmaker.
lead_paragraph: With a pedigree chock-full of legendary cars, the designer Jason Castriota is hoping to begin a new era at the struggling carmaker.

headline.main: A Vision for Saab, Perhaps Too Late to Save It
headline.print_headline: A Vision for Saab, Perhaps Too Late to Save It
headline.seo: Saab’s New Visionary Hopes for Salvation
